Script.string: The wounds of war healed. Flowers bloomed.
However, life is not a story.
The ending is rarely the last word.
Noctenium, the mineral of night, is discovered.
The struggle for noctenium grows; loyalties are forgotten.
With no mission once the war was over, the Valkyon Federation fell by the wayside.
Without their arbitration, unity is no longer a priority.
Guilds with similar goals unite with major cities for protection…and power.
War clouds are there on the horizon, threatening the world once again.
Life continues on as unions emerge—for better or worse.
The time of schism has begun.
